Comment: Abilities: A04H (Resurgent Flame Strike), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Conjures a pillar of flame that burns ground units for <A0F9,DataA2> damage a second for <A0F9,HeroDur2> seconds. The pillar of flame subsides after <A0F9,Dur2> seconds, during which units within continue to take <A0F9,DataC2> damage per second. The first two times the pillar subsides, it resurges again for the same duration.
